title: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED on simple conv2d
body_html:
In [1]: import torch

In [2]: x = torch.randn(1024, 3, 224, 224).cuda(1)

In [3]: c = torch.nn.Conv2d(3, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False).cuda(1)

In [4]: c(x)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
RuntimeError                              Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-4-497ccf32130c> in <module>()
----> 1 c(x)

~/miniconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py in __call__(self, *input, **k
wargs)
    475             result = self._slow_forward(*input, **kwargs)
    476         else:
--> 477             result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
    478         for hook in self._forward_hooks.values():
    479             hook_result = hook(self, input, result)

~/miniconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py in forward(self, input)
    306     def forward(self, input):
    307         return F.conv2d(input, self.weight, self.bias, self.stride,
--> 308                         self.padding, self.dilation, self.groups)
    309
    310

RuntimeError: CuDNN error: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED. This error may appear if you passed in a n
on-contiguous input.

body:
```
In [1]: import torch

In [2]: x = torch.randn(1024, 3, 224, 224).cuda(1)

In [3]: c = torch.nn.Conv2d(3, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False).cuda(1)

In [4]: c(x)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
RuntimeError                              Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-4-497ccf32130c> in <module>()
----> 1 c(x)

~/miniconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py in __call__(self, *input, **k
wargs)
    475             result = self._slow_forward(*input, **kwargs)
    476         else:
--> 477             result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
    478         for hook in self._forward_hooks.values():
    479             hook_result = hook(self, input, result)

~/miniconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py in forward(self, input)
    306     def forward(self, input):
    307         return F.conv2d(input, self.weight, self.bias, self.stride,
--> 308                         self.padding, self.dilation, self.groups)
    309
    310

on-contiguous input.
```
